definition: A physiological measurement that indicates the force exerted by circulating blood on the walls of blood vessels, often used as an indicator of overall health and cardiovascular function.

examples.english: My blood pressure is too high.

examples.german: Der Arzt hat meinen Blutdruck gemessen.
examples.english: The doctor measured my blood pressure.

examples.german: Hoher Blutdruck kann zu Herzproblemen führen.
examples.english: High blood pressure can lead to heart problems.
Low blood pressure can cause dizziness.

examples.german: Regelmäßige Bewegung kann den Blutdruck senken.
examples.english: Regular exercise can lower blood pressure.
